## `SetHistogramBarEffect`

Sets bar appearance (in histograms) for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramBarEffect(BoxEffect barEffect)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`BoxEffect`](#boxeffect) effect | The effect to apply to the bars. |
